item.title: AWS Invalid Credentials Issue â€” Time Sync Resolution
item.description:
AWS Invalid Credentials Issue â€” Time Sync Resolution

ðŸ§© Problem Overview

While using AWS CLI, you might sometimes face the following error even when your credentials are correct: An error occurred (AuthFailure) when calling the DescribeVolumes operation: AWS was not able to validate the provided access credentials Example: aws ec2 describe-volumes –profile mycred

This error can be deceptive â€” itâ€™s not always about wrong keys or permissions. In many cases, itâ€™s caused by a time synchronization issue between your local VM and AWS servers.
